segments.text: Your watch is ten minutes slow . So it's should be nine sharp . I'm gonna be late again . What will be my excuse this time ? It should be set the alarm for seven thirty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't cry over spilled milk , Fred ? Could you stay with me a few minutes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? Why ? What's wrong with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just hate being alone at home with nothing to do about listen to the clock ticking.It ' s so lonely and boring . My sickness makes it worse . When will I recover ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You will be fine in the couple of month , just be patient . I've got to woke now , I'll be late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You only care about your work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , baby , you are everything to me . all I do just for our family .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Stay just a few minutes longer , OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I'll leave at 9:15 , Is that all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll spent more time with you in the future , Dina .
segments.speaker: S1
